cmp: 志 (the will, sign/mark/to record/write a footnote)
mng: sign, mark, to record, to write a footnote

exm.mng: sign, mark, symbol, logo, to symbolize, to indicate, to mark
to take an oath to do sth, to pledge, to vow
to accomplish one's ambition, a dream come true, to enjoy success
blog, weblog, same as 博客[bo2 ke4]
to pay respects to the dead, to mark sb's passing
Ru Zhijuan (1925-1998), female novelist and politician
